main.intro: Hi, I am Shon or known as @pgnnet on internet. I am a software engineer and web developer. Currently, studying computer science and engineering. I love working on the full-stack web development and designinng application for mobile, web and desktop. Also data communications always fascinating me to write code in different programming languages to discover an effective use of the internet technologies. I use my machine as a server for different projects by creating http/tcp connection with ngrok server and testing for patching of initial version.
